comment.body: 所以还是考虑搭一个私有代理比较好
Are there any other ISP avaliable?

@Plasmmer: I have no idea what is going through @Aurea: 's head, but they are either crazy (and correct) or not crazy, and extrapolating their observations too far. Thus, they should temper their fire with some research. Part of the problem with today's media is that there is so much horsepuckee floating around that it is difficult to tell what is real and what is not. TL:DR: Get a second opinion, Aurea, THEN feel free to spam.
@Plasmmer: And you'll see that it hasn't happened yet >.> <.<
